scripts.build:bundles: sass scss/bundles/ai-dashboard.scss css/bundles/ai-dashboard.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/page-builder-dashboard.scss css/bundles/page-builder-dashboard.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/content-hub.scss css/bundles/content-hub.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/auth.scss css/bundles/auth.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/employability-pages.scss css/bundles/employability-pages.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/jobseeker-dashboard.scss css/bundles/jobseeker-dashboard.css --style=compressed && sass scss/bundles/agent-dashboard.scss css/bundles/agent-dashboard.css --style=compressed
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:admin && npm run build:routes && npm run build:bundles && npm run build:js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:images && npm run build:critical
